Will Mark New Era

Plans for the first of the new
Homewood dormitories were sent
out for bids October 1, according
to Edward L. Palmer, Jr., architect, and, if an acceptable bid is received by October 17, the closing
date, ground will be broken and
work of erection begin immediately.
Once the work is started, about
ten months will be required for
completion, Mr. Palmer said, and
the dormitories should be ready for
occupation by next fall.

Plans for the first of the new
Homewood dormitories were sent
out for bids October 1, according
to Edward L. Palmer, Jr., architect, and, if an acceptable bid is received by October 17, the closing
date, ground will be broken and
work of erection begin immediately.
Once the work is started, about
ten months will be required for
completion, Mr. Palmer said, and
the dormitories should be ready for
occupation by next fall.
